   tasyaiva dravyasya gandhaḥ | jalādau ca yadyasti gandhaḥ	tasya eva dravyasya ganDaH | jala AdO ca yadi asti ganDaH
   saukṣmyānnopalabhyate | tadā ko doṣaḥ | yathā vadanti  asti candramasi	sOkzmyAt na upalaByate | tadA kaH dozaH | yaTA vadanti asti candramasi
   tejaḥ tejasaḥ pratiniyatoṣṇatā iti | vadanti ca gharmagṛhe 'gnyapagame 'pi	tejaH tejasaH pratiniyata uzNa tA iti | vadanti ca Garma gRhe agni apagame api
   śiṣyamāṇasya dharmaṇo 'sti sūkṣmaṃ rūpamiti | yavāgāvasti sūkṣmaṃ	SizyamANasya DarmaNaH asti sUkzmam rUpam iti | yavAgO= asti sUkzmam

   taijasadravyaṃ syāt | vastutastu gandhavatī pañcarasavatīti na	tEjasa dravyam syAt | vastutas tu ganDavatI paQca rasavatI iti na

   taijasadravyāṇi | tejaso lakṣaṇaṃ laghutvaṃ kāṃsyādīnāṃ gurutvaṃ, tejaso	tEjasa dravyANi | tejasaH lakzaNam laGu tvam kAMsya AdInAm guru tvan, tejasaH

   vailakṣaṇye 'pi tāni taijasadravyāṇīti jñāpyante | tāni ca tejaso	vElakzaNye api tAni tEjasa dravyANi iti jQApyante | tAni ca tejasaH 
   viruddhāni | kasmāt | (SSS_153) agnisaṃyoge 'pacayāt | yadi taijasāni,	virudDAni | kasmAt | (H SS_153) agni saMyoge apacayAt | yadi tEjasAni,

   58 rasalakṣaṇavargaḥ	58 rasa lakzaNa vargaH
   raso nāma mathurāmlalavaṇakaṭutiktakaṣāyādayāḥ | ime ṣaḍrasāḥ	rasaH nAma maTurA amla lavaNa kawu tikta kazAya AdayAH | ime zaz rasAH

   59 sparśalakṣaṇavargaḥ	59 sparSa lakzaNa vargaH
